description: Associates a batch of resources to a percentage custom line item.

parameters.name: TargetArn
parameters.description: A percentage custom line item ARN to associate the resources to.

parameters.name: ResourceArns
parameters.description: A list containing the ARNs of the resources to be associated. (string) ---

parameters.name: BillingPeriodRange
parameters.description: The billing period range in which the custom line item request will be applied. The inclusive start billing period that defines a billing period range where a custom line is applied. ExclusiveEndBillingPeriod (string) --- The inclusive end billing period that defines a billing period range where a custom line is applied.

nested_params.name: InclusiveStartBillingPeriod
nested_params.description: The inclusive start billing period that defines a billing period range where a custom line is applied.

nested_params.name: ExclusiveEndBillingPeriod
nested_params.description: The inclusive end billing period that defines a billing period range where a custom line is applied.

nested_items.name: SuccessfullyAssociatedResources
nested_items.description: A list of AssociateResourceResponseElement for each resource that's been associated to a percentage custom line item successfully.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The resource ARN that was associated to the custom line item.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The reason why the resource association failed.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: A static error code that's used to classify the type of failure.

nested_items.name: FailedAssociatedResources
nested_items.description: A list of AssociateResourceResponseElement for each resource that failed association to a percentage custom line item.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The resource ARN that was associated to the custom line item.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The reason why the resource association failed.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: A static error code that's used to classify the type of failure.
